# 生成文件的内容
[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

生成文件包含：  
  
-   [描述块](../build/description-blocks.md)  
  
-   [命令](../build/commands-in-a-makefile.md)  
  
-   [宏](../build/macros-and-nmake.md)  
  
-   [推理规则](../build/inference-rules.md)  
  
-   [点指令](../build/dot-directives.md)  
  
-   [预处理指令](../build/makefile-preprocessing.md)  
  
## 备注  
 可以在生成文件中使用的其他功能是[通配符](../build/wildcards-and-nmake.md)、[长文件名](../build/long-filenames-in-a-makefile.md)、[注释](../build/comments-in-a-makefile.md)和[特殊字符](../build/special-characters-in-a-makefile.md)。  
  
 有关示例，请参见 [示例生成文件](../build/sample-makefile.md)。  
  
## 请参阅  
 [NMAKE 参考](../build/nmake-reference.md)
